desc:
There's no place like home. This has been our mantra when creating this model, with a closed design look and more "cozy" than ever.

It's super warm and has eco-friendly materials as it's made from 10 recycled plastic bottles. Plus, we've brought back our production so it's a 100% made in Spain product.

Designed so you won't take them off all day long and tested in the hardest Sundays of Netflix, TV movies and pizza.
